item.title: CVE-2024-24878|2024-02-08T12:58:38.613Z -- PT Woo Plugins (by Webdados) -- Portugal CTT Tracking for WooCommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PT Woo Plugins (by Webdados) Portugal CTT Tracking for WooCommerce allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Portugal CTT Tracking for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.1.
